rows.label: tlk45320151_02_msg0002
rows.name:
However...I am quite concerned about
the fact that he has lost his faithful
Blade Wadatsumi.

rows.label: tlk45320151_02_msg0003
rows.name:
It's doubly harder without the counsel
of his wise sister. But duty to one's
country must come before even family.

rows.label: tlk45320151_02_msg0004
rows.name:
As the Imperial Guard, we must work
doubly hard to ensure His Majesty's
safety in these trying times.
